001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.object.Date;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.time.LocalDate;
022import java.time.LocalTime;
023import java.time.ZoneOffset;
024import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
025import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
026import java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.regex.Matcher;
029import java.util.regex.Pattern;
030
031import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034
035public class DateAdapter
036    extends AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter<Date, IDateItem> {
037  @NonNull
038  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
039      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "date")));
040  private static final Pattern DATE_TIMEZONE = Pattern.compile("^("
041      + "^(?:(?:2000|2400|2800|(?:19|2[0-9](?:0[48]|[2468][048]|[13579][26])))-02-29)"
042      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-02-(?:0[1-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-8]))"
043      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-(?:0[13578]|10|12)-(?:0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]))"
044      + "|(?:(?:(?:19|2[0-9])[0-9]{2})-(?:0[469]|11)-(?:0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|30))"
045      + ")"
046      + "(Z|[+-][0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})?$");
047
048  DateAdapter() {
049    super(Date.class);
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public List<QName> getNames() {
054    return NAMES;
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
059    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public Date parse(String value) {
064    Matcher matcher = DATE_TIMEZONE.matcher(value);
065    if (!matcher.matches()) {
066      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid date: " + value);
067    }
068
069    String parseValue
070        = String.format("%sT00:00:00%s", matcher.group(1), matcher.group(2) == null ? "" : matcher.group(2));
071    try {
072      TemporalAccessor accessor = DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(parseValue);
073      return new Date(ObjectUtils.notNull(ZonedDateTime.from(accessor)), true); // NOPMD - readability
074    } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
075      try {
076        TemporalAccessor accessor = DateFormats.DATE_TIME_WITHOUT_TZ.parse(parseValue);
077        LocalDate date = LocalDate.from(accessor);
078        return new Date(ObjectUtils.notNull(ZonedDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MIN, ZoneOffset.UTC)), false);
079      } catch (DateTimeParseException ex2) {
080        IllegalArgumentException newEx = new IllegalArgumentException(ex2.getLocalizedMessage(), ex2);
081        newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
082        throw newEx; // NOPMD - false positive
083      }
084    }
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public String asString(Object obj) {
089    Date value = (Date) obj;
090    String retval;
091    if (value.hasTimeZone()) {
092      @SuppressWarnings("null")
093      @NonNull
094      String formatted = DateFormats.DATE_WITH_TZ.format(value.getValue());
095      retval = formatted;
096    } else {
097      @SuppressWarnings("null")
098      @NonNull
099      String formatted = DateFormats.DATE_WITHOUT_TZ.format(value.getValue());
100      retval = formatted;
101    }
102    return retval;
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public Class<IDateItem> getItemClass() {
107    return IDateItem.class;
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public IDateItem newItem(Object value) {
112    Date item = toValue(value);
113    return IDateItem.valueOf(item);
114  }
115
116  @Override
117  @NonNull
118  protected IDateItem castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
119    IDateItem retval;
120    if (item instanceof IDateTimeItem) {
121      ZonedDateTime value = ((IDateTimeItem) item).asZonedDateTime();
122      retval = IDateItem.valueOf(value);
123    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem || item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
124      retval = super.castInternal(item);
125    } else {
126      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
127          String.format("unsupported item type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
128    }
129    return retval;
130  }
131}
